60 class TAGLIB_EXPORT IOStream
61 {
62 public:
66 enum Position {
68 Beginning,
70 Current,
72 End
73 };
74

76
80 virtual ~IOStream();
81

84
88 virtual FileName name() const = 0;
89

94
104 virtual void writeBlock(const ByteVector &data) = 0;
105
113 virtual void insert(const ByteVector &data,
114 offset_t start = 0, size_t replace = 0) = 0;
115
123 virtual void removeBlock(offset_t start = 0, size_t length = 0) = 0;
124
128 virtual bool readOnly() const = 0;
129

135

143

148

153

158

163

165 class IOStreamPrivate;
166 TAGLIB_MSVC_SUPPRESS_WARNING_NEEDS_TO_HAVE_DLL_INTERFACE

168 };
